   19: 
   20: -module(escript_SUITE).
   21: -export([
   22: 	 all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 init_per_testcase/2,
   25: 	 end_per_testcase/2,
   26: 	 basic/1,
   27: 	 errors/1,
   28: 	 strange_name/1,
   29: 	 emulator_flags/1,
   30: 	 emulator_flags_no_shebang/1,
   31: 	 two_lines/1,
   32: 	 module_script/1,
   33: 	 beam_script/1,
   34: 	 archive_script/1,
   35: 	 archive_script_file_access/1,
   36: 	 epp/1,
   37: 	 create_and_extract/1,
   38: 	 foldl/1,
   39: 	 overflow/1,
   40: 	 verify_sections/4,
   41:          unicode/1,
   42:          bad_io_server/1
   43: 	]).
   44: 
   45: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   46: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   47: 
   48: suite() ->
   49:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   50:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   51: 
   52: all() -> 
   53:     [basic, errors, strange_name, emulator_flags,
   54:      emulator_flags_no_shebang, two_lines,
   55:      module_script, beam_script, archive_script, epp,
   56:      create_and_extract, foldl, overflow,
   57:      archive_script_file_access, unicode, bad_io_server].
   58: 
   59: groups() -> 
   60:     [].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   69:     Config.
   70: 
   71: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   78:     ok.
   79: 
   80: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   81: 
   82: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   84:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
   85:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial 5",
   86: 	<<"factorial 5 = 120\nExitCode:0">>),
   87:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_compile 10",
   88: 	<<"factorial 10 = 3628800\nExitCode:0">>),
   89:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_compile_main 7",
   90: 	<<"factorial 7 = 5040\nExitCode:0">>),
   91:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_warning 20",
   92: 	[data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
   93: 		    "factorial 20 = 2432902008176640000\nExitCode:0">>]),
   94:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s", "factorial_warning",
   95: 		  [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
   96:                               "%   12| bar() ->\n"
   97:                               "%     | ^\n\n"
   98:                               "ExitCode:0">>]),
   99:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s -i", "factorial_warning",
  100: 		  [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
  101:                               "%   12| bar() ->\n"
  102:                               "%     | ^\n\n"
  103:                               "ExitCode:0">>]),
  104:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-c -s", "factorial_warning",
  105: 		  [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
  106:                               "%   12| bar() ->\n"
  107:                               "%     | ^\n\n"
  108:                               "ExitCode:0">>]),
  109:     run(Config, Dir, "filesize "++filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),"filesize"),
  110: 	[data_dir,<<"filesize:11:1: Warning: function id/1 is unused\n324\nExitCode:0">>]),
  111:     run(Config, Dir, "test_script_name",
  112: 	[data_dir,<<"test_script_name\nExitCode:0">>]),
  113:     run(Config, Dir, "tail_rec 1000",
  114: 	[<<"ok\nExitCode:0">>]),
  115: 
  116:     %% We expect the trap_exit flag for the process to be false,
  117:     %% since that is the default state for newly spawned processes.
  118:     run(Config, Dir, "trap_exit",
  119: 	<<"false\nExitCode:0">>),
  120:     ok.
  121: 
  122: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  123: 
  124: errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  126:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  127:     run(Config, Dir, "compile_error",
  128: 	[data_dir,<<"compile_error:5:12: syntax error before: '*'\n">>,
  129: 	 data_dir,<<"compile_error:8:9: syntax error before: blarf\n">>,
  130: 	 <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  131:     run(Config, Dir, "lint_error",
  132: 	[data_dir,<<"lint_error:6:1: function main/1 already defined\n">>,
  133: 	 data_dir,"lint_error:8:10: variable 'ExitCode' is unbound\n",
  134: 	 <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  135:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s", "lint_error",
  136: 		  [data_dir,<<"lint_error:6:1: function main/1 already defined\n"
  137:                               "%    6| main(Args) ->\n"
  138:                               "%     | ^\n\n">>,
  139: 		   data_dir,("lint_error:8:10: variable 'ExitCode' is unbound\n"
  140:                              "%    8|     halt(ExitCode).\n"
  141:                              "%     |          ^\n\n"),
  142: 		   <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  143:     ok.
  144: 
  145: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  146: 
  147: strange_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  148:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  149:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  150:     run(Config, Dir, "strange.name -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  151: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  152: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  153:     ok.
  154: 
  155: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  156: 
  157: emulator_flags(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  159:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  160:     run(Config, Dir, "emulator_flags -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  161: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  162: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  163: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  164: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  165: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  166: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  170: 
  171: two_lines(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  172:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  173:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  174:     run(Config, Dir, "two_lines -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  175: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  176: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  177: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  178: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  179:     ok.
  180: 
  181: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  182: 
  183: emulator_flags_no_shebang(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  185:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  186:     %% Need run_with_opts, to always use "escript" explicitly
  187:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", "emulator_flags_no_shebang -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  188: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  189: 		     "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  190: 		     "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  191: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  192: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  193: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  194:     ok.
  195: 
  196: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  197: %% Pick the source code from the emulator_flags script
  198: %% Generate a new escript with a module header
  199: 
  200: module_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  201:     %% Read orig file
  202:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  203:     OrigFile = filename:join([Data,"emulator_flags"]),
  204:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  205:     [Shebang, Mode, Flags | Source] = string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  206:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  207: 
  208:     %% Write source file
  209:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  210:     Dir = filename:absname(Priv), % Get rid of trailing slash.
  211:     Base = "module_script",
  212:     ErlFile = filename:join([Priv, Base ++ ".erl"]),
  213:     ErlCode = ["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  214: 	       "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  215: 	       string:join(Source, "\n"),
  216: 	       "\n"],
  217:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, ErlCode),
  218: 
  219: %%%%%%%
  220:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  221: 
  222:     %% With shebang
  223:     NoArgsBase = Base ++ "_no_args_with_shebang",
  224:     NoArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase]),
  225:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile,
  226: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  227: 			  ErlCode]),
  228:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile, OrigFI),
  229: 
  230:     run(Config, Dir, NoArgsBase ++ " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  231: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  232: 	   "nostick:[]\n"
  233: 	   "mnesia:[]\n"
  234: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  235: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  236: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  237: 
  238:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  239: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  240: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  241: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  242: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  243: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  244: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  245: 
  246:     %% Without shebang
  247:     NoArgsBase2 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_shebang",
  248:     NoArgsFile2 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase2]),
  249:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile2,
  250: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  251: 			  ErlCode]),
  252:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile2, OrigFI),
  253: 
  254:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase2 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  255: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  256: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  257: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  258: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  259: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  260: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  261: 
  262:     %% Plain module without header
  263:     NoArgsBase3 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_header",
  264:     NoArgsFile3 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase3]),
  265:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile3, [ErlCode]),
  266:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile3, OrigFI),
  267: 
  268:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase3 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  269: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  270: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  271: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  272: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  273: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  274: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  275: 
  276: %%%%%%%
  277:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  278: 
  279:     %% With shebang
  280:     ArgsBase = Base ++ "_args_with_shebang",
  281:     ArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, ArgsBase]),
  282:     ok = file:write_file(ArgsFile,
  283: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  284: 			  Mode, "\n",
  285: 			  Flags, "\n",
  286: 			  ErlCode]),
  287:     ok = file:write_file_info(ArgsFile, OrigFI),
  288: 
  289:     run(Config, Dir, ArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  290: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  291: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  292: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  293: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  294: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  295: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  296: 
  297:     ok.
  298: 
  299: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  300: %% Pick the source code from the emulator_flags script and compile it.
  301: %% Generate a new escript containing the beam code and the escript header
  302: beam_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  303:     %% Read orig file
  304:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  305:     OrigFile = filename:join([Data,"emulator_flags"]),
  306:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  307:     [Shebang, Mode, Flags | Source] = string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  308:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  309: 
  310:     %% Write source file
  311:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  312:     Dir = filename:absname(Priv), % Get rid of trailing slash.
  313:     Base = "beam_script",
  314:     ErlFile = filename:join([Priv, Base ++ ".erl"]),
  315:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile,
  316: 			 ["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  317: 			  "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  318: 			  string:join(Source, "\n"),
  319: 			  "\n"]),
  320: 
  321:     %% Compile the code
  322:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} = compile:file(ErlFile, [binary]),
  323: 
  324: %%%%%%%
  325:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  326: 
  327:     %% With shebang
  328:     NoArgsBase = Base ++ "_no_args_with_shebang",
  329:     NoArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase]),
  330:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile,
  331: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  332: 			  BeamCode]),
  333:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile, OrigFI),
  334: 
  335:     run(Config, Dir, NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  336: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  337: 	   "nostick:[]\n"
  338: 	   "mnesia:[]\n"
  339: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  340: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  341: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  342: 
  343:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  344: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  345: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  346: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  347: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  348: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  349: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  350: 
  351:     %% Without shebang
  352:     NoArgsBase2 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_shebang",
  353:     NoArgsFile2 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase2]),
  354:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile2,
  355: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  356: 			  BeamCode]),
  357:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile2, OrigFI),
  358: 
  359:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase2 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  360: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  361: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  362: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  363: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  364: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  365: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  366: 
  367:     %% Plain beam file without header
  368:     NoArgsBase3 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_header",
  369:     NoArgsFile3 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase3]),
  370:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile3, [BeamCode]),
  371:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile3, OrigFI),
  372: 
  373:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase3 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  374: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  375: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  376: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  377: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  378: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  379: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  380: 
  381: %%%%%%%
  382:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  383: 
  384:     %% With shebang
  385:     ArgsBase = Base ++ "_args",
  386:     ArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, ArgsBase]),
  387:     ok = file:write_file(ArgsFile,
  388: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  389: 			  Mode, "\n",
  390: 			  Flags, "\n",
  391: 			  BeamCode]),
  392:     ok = file:write_file_info(ArgsFile, OrigFI),
  393: 
  394:     run(Config, Dir, ArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  395: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  396: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  397: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  398: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  399: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  400: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  401:     ok.
  402: 
  403: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  404: %% Create an archive file containing two entire applications plus two
  405: %% alternate main modules. Generate a new escript containing the archive
  406: %% (with .app and .beam files and) and the escript header.
  407: 
  408: archive_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  409:     %% Copy the orig files to priv_dir
  410:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  411:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  412:     Archive = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script.zip"]),
  413:     {ok, _} = zip:create(Archive, ["archive_script"],
  414: 			 [{compress, []}, {cwd, DataDir}]),
  415:     {ok, _} = zip:extract(Archive, [{cwd, PrivDir}]),
  416:     TopDir = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script"]),
  417: 
  418:     %% Compile the code
  419:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dict"),
  420:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dummy"),
  421:     {ok, MainFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  422:     ok = compile_files(MainFiles, TopDir, TopDir),
  423: 
  424:     %% Create the archive
  425:     {ok, TopFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  426:     {ok, {_, ArchiveBin}} = zip:create(Archive, TopFiles,
  427: 				       [memory, {compress, []}, {cwd, TopDir}]),
  428: 
  429:     %% Read the source script
  430:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir, "emulator_flags"]),
  431:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  432:     [Shebang, Mode, _Flags | _Source] =
  433: 	string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  434:     Flags = "%%! -archive_script_dict foo bar"
  435: 	" -archive_script_dict foo"
  436: 	" -archive_script_dummy bar",
  437:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  438: 
  439: %%%%%%%
  440:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  441:     MainBase = "archive_script_main",
  442:     MainScript = filename:join([PrivDir, MainBase]),
  443: 
  444:     %% With shebang
  445:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript,
  446: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  447: 			  Flags, "\n",
  448: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  449:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  450: 
  451:     run(Config, PrivDir, MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  452: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  453: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  454: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  455: 	   "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  456: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  457: 
  458:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  459: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  460: 		     "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  461: 		     "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  462: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  463: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  464: 
  465:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_with_shebang"),
  466: 
  467:     %% Without shebang (no flags)
  468:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript,
  469: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  470: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  471:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  472: 
  473:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  474: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  475: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  476: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  477: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  478: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  479:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_shebang"),
  480: 
  481:     %% Plain archive without header (no flags)
  482: 
  483:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript, [ArchiveBin]),
  484:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  485: 
  486:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  487: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  488: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  489: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  490: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  491: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  492:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_header"),
  493: 
  494: %%%%%%%
  495:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  496:     AltBase = "archive_script_alternate_main",
  497:     AltScript = filename:join([PrivDir, AltBase]),
  498:     ok = file:write_file(AltScript,
  499: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  500: 			  Mode, "\n",
  501: 			  Flags, " -escript main archive_script_main2\n",
  502: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  503:     ok = file:write_file_info(AltScript, OrigFI),
  504: 
  505:     run(Config, PrivDir, AltBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  506: 	[<<"main2:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  507: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  508: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  509: 	   "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  510: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  511: 
  512:     ok.
  513: 
  514: %% Test the correction of OTP-10071
  515: %% The errors identified are
  516: %%
  517: %% a) If primary archive was named "xxx", then a file in the same
  518: %%    directory named "xxxyyy" would be interpreted as a file named yyy
  519: %%    inside the archive.
  520: %%
  521: %% b) erl_prim_loader did not correctly create and normalize absolute
  522: %%    paths for primary archive and files inside it, so unless given
  523: %%    with exact same path files inside the archive would not be
  524: %%    found. E.g. if escript was started as ./xxx then "xxx/file"
  525: %%    would not be found since erl_prim_loader would try to match
  526: %%    /full/path/to/xxx with /full/path/to/./xxx. Same problem with
  527: %%    ../. Also, the use of symlinks in the path to the archive would
  528: %%    cause problems.
  529: %%
  530: %% c) Depending on how the primary archive was built,
  531: %%    erl_prim_loader:list_dir/1 would sometimes return an empty string
  532: %%    inside the file list. This was a virtual element representing the
  533: %%    top directory of the archive. This shall not occur.
  534: %%
  535: archive_script_file_access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  536:     %% Copy the orig files to priv_dir
  537:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  538:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  539: 
  540:     MainMod = "archive_script_file_access",
  541:     MainSrc = MainMod ++ ".erl",
  542:     MainBeam = MainMod ++ ".beam",
  543: 
  544:     Archive = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script_file_access.zip"]),
  545:     {ok, _} = zip:create(Archive, ["archive_script_file_access"],
  546: 			 [{compress, []}, {cwd, DataDir}]),
  547:     {ok, _} = zip:extract(Archive, [{cwd, PrivDir}]),
  548:     TopDir = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script_file_access"]),
  549: 
  550:     %% Compile the code
  551:     ok = compile_files([MainSrc], TopDir, TopDir),
  552: 
  553:     %% First, create a file structure which will be included in the archive:
  554:     %%
  555:     %% dir1/
  556:     %% dir1/subdir1/
  557:     %% dir1/subdir1/file1
  558:     %%
  559:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  560:     ok = file:set_cwd(TopDir),
  561:     DummyDir = "dir1",
  562:     DummySubDir = filename:join(DummyDir, "subdir1"),
  563:     RelDummyFile = filename:join(DummySubDir, "file1"),
  564:     DummyFile = filename:join(TopDir,RelDummyFile),
  565:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(DummyFile),
  566:     ok = file:write_file(DummyFile, ["foo\nbar\nbaz"]),
  567: 
  568:     %% 1. Create zip archive by adding the dummy file and the beam
  569:     %%    file as binaries to zip.
  570:     %%
  571:     %% This used to provoke the following issues when the script was run as
  572:     %% "./<script_name>":
  573:     %% a. erl_prim_loader:read_file_info/1 returning 'error'
  574:     %% b. erl_prim_loader:list_dir/1 returning {ok, ["dir1", [], "file1"]}
  575:     %%    leading to an infinite loop in reltool_target:spec_dir/1
  576:     Files1 =
  577: 	lists:map(fun(Filename) ->
  578: 			  {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(Filename),
  579: 			  {Filename,Bin}
  580: 		  end,
  581: 		  [RelDummyFile,MainBeam]),
  582:     {ok, {"mem", Bin1}} = zip:create("mem", Files1, [memory]),
  583: 
  584:     %% Create the escript
  585:     ScriptName1 = "archive_script_file_access1",
  586:     Script1 = filename:join([PrivDir, ScriptName1]),
  587:     Flags = "-escript main " ++ MainMod,
  588:     ok = escript:create(Script1,[shebang,{emu_args,Flags},{archive,Bin1}]),
  589:     ok = file:change_mode(Script1,8#00744),
  590: 
  591:     %% If supported, create a symlink to the script. This is used to
  592:     %% test error b) described above this test case.
  593:     SymlinkName1 = "symlink_to_"++ScriptName1,
  594:     Symlink1 = filename:join([PrivDir, SymlinkName1]),
  595:     file:make_symlink(ScriptName1,Symlink1), % will fail if not supported
  596: 
  597:     %% Also add a dummy file in the same directory with the same name
  598:     %% as the script except is also has an extension. This used to
  599:     %% test error a) described above this test case.
  600:     ok = file:write_file(Script1 ++ ".extension",
  601: 			 <<"same name as script, but with extension">>),
  602: 
  603:     %% Change to script's directory and run it as "./<script_name>"
  604:     ok = file:set_cwd(PrivDir),
  605:     run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ ScriptName1 ++ " " ++ ScriptName1,
  606: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  607:     ok = file:set_cwd(TopDir),
  608: 
  609: 
  610:     %% 2. Create zip archive by letting zip read the files from the file system
  611:     %%
  612:     %% The difference compared to the archive_script_file_access1 is
  613:     %% that this will have a file element for each directory in the
  614:     %% archive - while archive_script_file_access1 will only have a
  615:     %% file element per regular file.
  616:     Files2 = [DummyDir,MainBeam],
  617:     {ok, {"mem", Bin2}} = zip:create("mem", Files2, [memory]),
  618: 
  619:     %% Create the escript
  620:     ScriptName2 = "archive_script_file_access2",
  621:     Script2 = filename:join([PrivDir, ScriptName2]),
  622:     ok = escript:create(Script2,[shebang,{emu_args,Flags},{archive,Bin2}]),
  623:     ok = file:change_mode(Script2,8#00744),
  624: 
  625:     %% Also add a dummy file in the same directory with the same name
  626:     %% as the script except is also has an extension. This used to
  627:     %% test error a) described above this test case.
  628:     ok = file:write_file(Script2 ++ ".extension",
  629: 			 <<"same name as script, but with extension">>),
  630: 
  631:     %% If supported, create a symlink to the script. This is used to
  632:     %% test error b) described above this test case.
  633:     SymlinkName2 = "symlink_to_"++ScriptName2,
  634:     Symlink2 = filename:join([PrivDir, SymlinkName2]),
  635:     file:make_symlink(ScriptName2,Symlink2), % will fail if not supported
  636: 
  637:     %% Change to script's directory and run it as "./<script_name>"
  638:     ok = file:set_cwd(PrivDir),
  639:     run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ ScriptName2 ++ " " ++ ScriptName2,
  640: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  641: 
  642:     %% 3. If symlinks are supported, run one of the scripts via a symlink.
  643:     %%
  644:     %% This is in order to test error b) described above this test case.
  645:     case element(1,os:type()) =:= win32 orelse file:read_link(Symlink2) of
  646: 	{ok,_} ->
  647: 	    run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ SymlinkName2 ++ " " ++ ScriptName2,
  648: 		[<<"ExitCode:0">>]);
  649: 	_ -> % not supported
  650: 	    ok
  651:     end,
  652:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir).
  653: 
  654: 
  655: compile_app(TopDir, AppName) ->
  656:     AppDir = filename:join([TopDir, AppName]),
  657:     SrcDir = filename:join([AppDir, "src"]),
  658:     OutDir = filename:join([AppDir, "ebin"]),
  659:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(SrcDir),
  660:     compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir).
  661: 
  662: compile_files([File | Files], SrcDir, OutDir) ->
  663:     case filename:extension(File) of
  664: 	".erl" ->
  665: 	    AbsFile = filename:join([SrcDir, File]),
  666: 	    case compile:file(AbsFile, [{outdir, OutDir},report_errors]) of
  667: 		{ok, _Mod} ->
  668: 		    compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir);
  669: 		Error ->
  670: 		    {compilation_error, AbsFile, OutDir, Error}
  671: 	    end;
  672: 	_ ->
  673: 	    compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir)
  674:     end;
  675: compile_files([], _, _) ->
  676:     ok.
  677: 
  678: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  679: 
  680: epp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  681:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  682:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  683:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_epp 5",
  684: 	<<"factorial 5 = 120\nExitCode:0">>),
  685:     ok.
  686: 
  687: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  688: 
  689: create_and_extract(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  690:     {NewFile, FileInfo,
  691:      EmuArg, Source,
  692:      _ErlBase, ErlCode,
  693:      _BeamBase, BeamCode,
  694:      ArchiveBin} =
  695: 	prepare_creation("create_and_extract", Config),
  696: 
  697:     Bodies =
  698: 	[[{source, ErlCode}],
  699: 	 [{beam, BeamCode}],
  700: 	 [{archive, ArchiveBin}]],
  701: 
  702:     %% Verify all combinations of scripts with shebangs
  703:     [verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo, S ++ C ++ E ++ B) ||
  704: 	S <- [[{shebang, default}],
  705: 	      [{shebang, "/usr/bin/env     escript"}]],
  706: 	C <- [[],
  707: 	      [{comment, undefined}],
  708: 	      [{comment, default}],
  709: 	      [{comment, "This is a nonsense comment"}]],
  710: 	E <- [[],
  711: 	      [{emu_args, undefined}],
  712: 	      [{emu_args, EmuArg}]],
  713: 	B <- [[{source, Source}] | Bodies]],
  714: 
  715:     %% Verify all combinations of scripts without shebangs
  716:     [verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo, S ++ C ++ E ++ B) ||
  717: 	S <- [[], [{shebang, undefined}]],
  718: 	C <- [[], [{comment, undefined}]],
  719: 	E <- [[], [{emu_args, undefined}]],
  720: 	B <- Bodies],
  721: 
  722:     %% Verify the compile_source option
  723:     file:delete(NewFile),
  724:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{source, Source}]),
  725:     {ok, [_, _, _, {source, Source}]} = escript:extract(NewFile, []),
  726:     {ok, [_, _, _, {source, BeamCode2}]} =
  727: 	escript:extract(NewFile, [compile_source]),
  728:     verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo,
  729: 		    [{shebang, default},
  730: 		     {comment, default},
  731: 		     {beam, BeamCode2}]),
  732: 
  733:     file:delete(NewFile),
  734:     ok.
  735: 
  736: prepare_creation(Base, Config) ->
  737:     %% Read the source
  738:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  739:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  740:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir,"emulator_flags"]),
  741:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  742:     NewFile = filename:join([PrivDir, Base]),
  743:     {ok, [{shebang, default},
  744: 	  {comment, _},
  745: 	  {emu_args, EmuArg},
  746: 	  {source, Source}]} =
  747: 	escript:extract(OrigFile, []),
  748: 
  749:     %% Compile the code
  750:     ErlFile = NewFile ++ ".erl",
  751:     ErlCode = list_to_binary(["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  752: 			      "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  753: 			      Source, "\n\n"]),
  754:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, ErlCode),
  755: 
  756:     %% Compile the code
  757:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} =
  758: 	compile:file(ErlFile, [binary, debug_info]),
  759: 
  760:     %% Create an archive
  761:     {ok, {_, ArchiveBin}} =
  762: 	zip:create("dummy_archive_name",
  763: 		   [{Base ++ ".erl", ErlCode},
  764: 		    {Base ++ ".beam", BeamCode}],
  765: 		   [{compress, []}, memory]),
  766:     {NewFile, FileInfo,
  767:      EmuArg, Source,
  768:      Base ++ ".erl", ErlCode,
  769:      Base ++ ".beam", BeamCode,
  770:      ArchiveBin}.
  771: 
  772: verify_sections(Config, File, FileInfo, Sections) ->
  773:     io:format("~p:verify_sections(\n\t~p,\n\t~p,\n\t~p).\n",
  774: 	      [?MODULE, File, FileInfo, Sections]),
  775: 
  776:     %% Create
  777:     file:delete(File),
  778:     ok = escript:create(File, Sections),
  779:     ok = file:write_file_info(File, FileInfo),
  780: 
  781:     %% Run
  782:     Dir = filename:absname(filename:dirname(File)),
  783:     Base = filename:basename(File),
  784: 
  785:     HasArg = fun(Tag) ->
  786: 		     case lists:keysearch(Tag, 1, Sections) of
  787: 			 false -> false;
  788: 			 {value, {_, undefined}} -> false;
  789: 			 {value, _} -> true
  790: 		     end
  791: 	     end,
  792:     ExpectedMain = <<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n">>,
  793:     ExpectedOutput =
  794: 	case HasArg(emu_args) of
  795: 	    true ->
  796: 		<<"nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  797: 		  "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  798: 		  "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  799: 		  "unknown:[]\n"
  800: 		  "ExitCode:0">>;
  801: 	    false ->
  802: 		<<"nostick:[]\nmnesia:[]\nERL_FLAGS=false\nunknown:[]\nExitCode:0">>
  803: 	end,
  804: 
  805:     InputArgs = Base ++ " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  806:     Expected = <<ExpectedMain/binary, ExpectedOutput/binary>>,
  807:     case HasArg(shebang) of
  808: 	true ->
  809: 	    run(Config, Dir, InputArgs, [Expected]);
  810: 	false ->
  811: 	    run_with_opts(Config, Dir, [], InputArgs, [Expected])
  812:     end,
  813: 
  814:     %% Verify
  815:     {ok, Bin} = escript:create(binary, Sections),
  816:     {ok, Read} = file:read_file(File),
  817:     Bin = Read, % Assert
  818: 
  819:     Normalized = normalize_sections(Sections),
  820:     {ok, Extracted} = escript:extract(File, []),
  821:     io:format("Normalized; ~p\n", [Normalized]),
  822:     io:format("Extracted ; ~p\n", [Extracted]),
  823:     Normalized = Extracted, % Assert
  824:     ok.
  825: 
  826: normalize_sections(Sections) ->
  827:     AtomToTuple =
  828: 	fun(Val) ->
  829: 		if
  830: 		    is_atom(Val) -> {Val, default};
  831: 		    true -> Val
  832: 		end
  833: 	end,
  834:     case lists:map(AtomToTuple, [{K, V} || {K, V} <- Sections, V =/= undefined]) of
  835: 	[{shebang, Shebang} | Rest] ->
  836: 	    [{shebang, Shebang} |
  837: 	     case Rest of
  838: 		 [{comment, Comment} | Rest2] ->
  839: 		     [{comment, Comment} |
  840: 		      case Rest2 of
  841: 			  [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body] ->
  842: 			      [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body];
  843: 			  [Body] ->
  844: 			      [{emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  845: 		      end
  846: 		     ];
  847: 		 [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body] ->
  848: 		     [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body];
  849: 		 [Body] ->
  850: 		     [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  851: 	     end
  852: 	    ];
  853: 	[Body] ->
  854: 	    [{shebang, undefined}, {comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  855:     end.
  856: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  857: 
  858: 
  859: 
  860: foldl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  861:     {NewFile, _FileInfo,
  862:      _EmuArg, _Source,
  863:      ErlBase, ErlCode,
  864:      BeamBase, _BeamCode,
  865:      ArchiveBin} =
  866: 	prepare_creation("foldl", Config),
  867: 
  868:     Collect = fun(Name, GetInfo, GetBin, Acc) ->
  869: 		      [{Name, GetInfo(), GetBin()} | Acc]
  870: 	      end,
  871: 
  872:     %% Get line numbers and the file attribute right
  873:     SourceFile = NewFile ++ ".erl",
  874:     <<_:1/binary, ErlCode2/binary>> = ErlCode,
  875:     ok = file:write_file(SourceFile, ErlCode2),
  876:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} =
  877: 	compile:file(SourceFile, [binary, debug_info]),
  878: 
  879:     %% Verify source script
  880:     ok = escript:create(SourceFile, [{source, ErlCode}]),
  881:     {ok, [{".", _, BeamCode2}]}
  882: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], SourceFile),
  883: 
  884:     {ok, Abstr} = beam_lib:chunks(BeamCode, [abstract_code]),
  885:     {ok, Abstr2} = beam_lib:chunks(BeamCode2, [abstract_code]),
  886:     %% io:format("abstr1=~p\n", [Abstr]),
  887:     %% io:format("abstr2=~p\n", [Abstr2]),
  888:     Abstr = Abstr2, % Assert
  889: 
  890:     %% Verify beam script
  891:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{beam, BeamCode}]),
  892:     {ok, [{".", _, BeamCode}]}
  893: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  894: 
  895:     %% Verify archive scripts
  896:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{archive, ArchiveBin}]),
  897:     {ok, [{BeamBase, #file_info{}, _},
  898: 	  {ErlBase, #file_info{}, _}]}
  899: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  900: 
  901:     ArchiveFiles = [{ErlBase, ErlCode}, {BeamBase, BeamCode}],
  902:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{archive, ArchiveFiles, []}]),
  903:     {ok, [{BeamBase, _, _},
  904: 	  {ErlBase, _, _}]}
  905: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  906: 
  907:     ok.
  908: 
  909: escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File) ->
  910:     code:ensure_loaded(zip),
  911:     case erlang:function_exported(zip, foldl, 3) of
  912: 	true ->
  913: 	    emulate_escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File);
  914: 	false ->
  915: 	    escript:foldl(Fun, Acc, File)
  916:     end.
  917: 
  918: emulate_escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File) ->
  919:     case escript:extract(File, [compile_source]) of
  920: 	{ok, [_Shebang, _Comment, _EmuArgs, Body]} ->
  921: 	    case Body of
  922: 		{source, BeamCode} ->
  923: 		    GetInfo = fun() -> file:read_file_info(File) end,
  924: 		    GetBin = fun() -> BeamCode end,
  925: 		    {ok, Fun(".", GetInfo, GetBin, Acc)};
  926: 		{beam, BeamCode} ->
  927: 		    GetInfo = fun() -> file:read_file_info(File) end,
  928: 		    GetBin = fun() -> BeamCode end,
  929: 		    {ok, Fun(".", GetInfo, GetBin, Acc)};
  930: 		{archive, ArchiveBin} ->
  931: 		    zip:foldl(Fun, Acc, {File, ArchiveBin})
  932: 	    end;
  933: 	{error, Reason} ->
  934: 	    {error, Reason}
  935:     end.
  936: 
  937: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  938:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  939:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  940:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode1",
  941:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  942:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  943:            "called as <<224,170,170>> / <<224,170,170>>\nExitCode:127">>]),
  944:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode2",
  945:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  946:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  947:            "called as <<\"\xaa\">> / <<\"\xaa\">>\nExitCode:127">>]),
  948:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode3", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  949:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode4", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  950:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode5", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  951:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode6", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  952:     ok.
  953: 
  954: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  955: 
  956: overflow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  957:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  958:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  959:     run(Config, Dir, "arg_overflow",
  960: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  961:     run(Config, Dir, "linebuf_overflow",
  962: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  963:     ok.
  964: 
  965: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  966: 
  967: %% OTP-16006, ERL-992
  968: bad_io_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  969:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  970:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  971:     run(Config, Dir, "bad_io_server",
  972:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  973:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  974:            "called as '\\x{400}' / 0\nExitCode:127">>]),
  975:     ok.
  976: 
  977: run(Config, Dir, Cmd, Expected) ->
  978:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", Cmd, Expected).
  979: 
  980: run_with_opts(Config, Dir, Opts, Cmd0, Expected) ->
  981:     [CmdName | _] = string:split(Cmd0, " ", all),
  982:     Cmd = case os:type() of
  983: 	      {win32,Wtype} ->
  984:                   %% This case is stolen from os:mk_cmd/2
  985:                   Command = case {os:getenv("COMSPEC"),Wtype} of
  986:                                 {false,windows} -> "command.com /c ";
  987:                                 {false,_} -> "cmd /c ";
  988:                                 {Cspec,_} -> lists:concat([Cspec," /c "])
  989:                             end,
  990:                   Command ++ "escript " ++ Opts ++ " " ++ filename:nativename(Dir) ++ "\\" ++ Cmd0;
  991: 	      _ -> "escript " ++ Opts ++ " " ++ Dir ++ "/" ++ Cmd0
  992: 	  end,
  993:     do_run(Config, CmdName, Dir, Cmd, Expected).
  994: 
  995: do_run(Config, CmdName, Dir, Cmd0, Expected0) ->
  996:     StdErrFile = tempnam(Config, CmdName),
  997:     Cmd = Cmd0 ++ " 2> " ++ filename:nativename(StdErrFile),
  998:     io:format("Run: ~p\n", [Cmd]),
  999:     Expected = iolist_to_binary(expected_output(Expected0, Dir)),
 1000: 
 1001:     Env = [{"PATH",Dir++":"++os:getenv("PATH")},
 1002:            {"ERL_FLAGS",false},{"ERL_AFLAGS",false}],
 1003:     Port = open_port({spawn,Cmd}, [exit_status,eof,in,{env,Env},hide]),
 1004:     StdOut = get_data(Port, []),
 1005:     receive
 1006: 	{Port,{exit_status,ExitCode}} ->
 1007: 	    {ok, StdErr} = file:read_file(StdErrFile),
 1008: 	    file:delete(StdErrFile),
 1009: 	    Res = [StdErr, StdOut],
 1010: 	    Actual = iolist_to_binary([Res,"ExitCode:"++integer_to_list(ExitCode)]),
 1011: 	    case matches(Expected, Actual) of
 1012: 		true ->
 1013: 		    ok;
 1014: 		false ->
 1015: 		    io:format("Expected: ~p\n", [Expected]),
 1016: 		    io:format("Actual:   ~p\n", [Actual]),
 1017: 		    ct:fail(failed)
 1018: 	    end
 1019:     end.
 1020: 
 1021: %% Check if Expected and Actual contain the same lines.
 1022: %% The lines may occur in different order.
 1023: matches(Expected, Actual) ->
 1024:     ExpectedLines = string:split(Expected, "\n", all),
 1025:     ActualLines = string:split(Actual, "\n", all),
 1026:     matches_1(ExpectedLines, ActualLines).
 1027: 
 1028: matches_1([], []) -> true;
 1029: matches_1([Line | Expected], Actual0) ->
 1030:     case delete_first(Line, Actual0) of
 1031: 	false -> false;
 1032: 	Actual -> matches_1(Expected, Actual)
 1033:     end.
 1034: 
 1035: delete_first(X, L) -> delete_first(X, L, []).
 1036: 
 1037: delete_first(_X, [], _Acc) -> false;
 1038: delete_first(X, [X | Tail], Acc) -> lists:reverse(Acc, Tail);
 1039: delete_first(X, [Y | Tail], Acc) -> delete_first(X, Tail, [Y | Acc]).
 1040: 
 1041: tempnam(Config, Prefix) ->
 1042:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1043:     File = filename:join(Dir, Prefix ++ ".stderr"),
 1044:     case file:delete(File) of
 1045: 	ok -> ok;
 1046: 	{error, enoent} -> ok
 1047:     end,
 1048:     case file:open(File, [write, exclusive, raw]) of
 1049: 	{ok, IoDev} ->
 1050: 	    ok = file:close(IoDev),
 1051: 	    ok = file:delete(File),
 1052: 	    File;
 1053: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1054: 	    io:format("Failed to create ~s: ~p\n", [File, Reason]),
 1055: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1056:     end.
 1057: 
 1058: get_data(Port, SoFar) ->
 1059:     receive
 1060: 	{Port,{data,Bytes}} ->
 1061: 	    get_data(Port, [SoFar|Bytes]);
 1062: 	{Port,eof} ->
 1063: 	    erlang:port_close(Port),
 1064: 	    SoFar
 1065:     end.
 1066: 
 1067: expected_output([data_dir|T], Data) ->
 1068:     Slash = case os:type() of
 1069: 		{win32,_} -> "\\";
 1070: 		_ -> "/"
 1071: 	    end,
 1072:     [filename:nativename(Data)++Slash|expected_output(T, Data)];
 1073: expected_output([H|T], Data) ->
 1074:     [H|expected_output(T, Data)];
 1075: expected_output([], _) ->
 1076:     [];
 1077: expected_output(Bin, _) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1078:     Bin.
 1079:
